Category.Name: Pita Sandwiches
Category.Description: *Platters include french fries and a pickle

Item.Name: Shawarma
Item.Description: Shredded roasted breast of chicken with onions, tomatoes, lettuce and hummus on pita bread

Item.Name: Gyro
Item.Description: Shredded roasted beef and lamb with Tzatziki sauce, onions, tomato and lettuce on pita bread

Item.Name: Falafel
Item.Description: Vegitarian sandwich handmade falafel, hummus, tomatoes, red onions and lettuce, wrapped in pita bread

Item.Name: Lamb kebob
Item.Description: Juicy fire roasted lamb kebob wrapped into pita bread with tomaties, onions, lettuce and mild signature tomato souce

Item.Name: Chicken kebob
Item.Description: Juicy fire roasted chicken kebob wrapped into pita bread with tomaties, onions, lettuce and mild signature tomato souce

Item.Name: Greek Salad
Item.Description: Roman lettuce, sliced tomatoes, cucumbers, black olives and onions, tossed in olive oil and vineger, topped with feta cheese and thinly sliced cured beef

Item.Name: Caesar Salad
Item.Description: Lettuce mix, cucumbers, onions topped with croutons, parmesan and our own Caesar deressing

Item.Name: Russian olivje
Item.Description: Russian style potato salad made with chicken, pickles, cucumbers, sweet peas, hard boiled eggs and mayo

Item.Name: Eggplant
Item.Description: Grilled eggplant, carrots, sweet peppers, tomatoes, cucumbers, cabbage and dressing

Item.Name: Khinkali
Item.Description: Ground pork, lamb, beef with spices.

Item.Name: Manti
Item.Description: Three large steamed dumplings stuffed with beef, lamb, served with butter and sour cream.

Item.Name: Pelmeni
Item.Description: Russian ravioli. Boiled dumplings stuffed with spiced ground beef or chicken and sour cream.

Item.Name: Perogies
Item.Description: Potatoes or cheese or cabbage filled dumpling served with sour cream.
